parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.57

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return a list of all dead units including agents and destroyed vehicles. Dead units may be in vehicles.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[allDead]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{ [[deleteVehicle]] _x } [[forEach]] [[allDead]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> allAlive: <code>_all = [[allUnits]] + [[vehicles]];
{
	_all [[pushBack]] [[agent]] _x;
} [[forEach]] ([[agents]] - [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[teamMemberNull]]]);
allAlive = _all - [[allDead]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allDeadMen]], [[allUnits]], [[allGroups]], [[playableUnits]], [[switchableUnits]], [[units]], [[vehicles]], [[allCurators]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 6, 2017 - 15:40 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Ebay|Ebay]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This also returns bodies hidden with [[hideBody]] until they are deleted. Tested in A2OA 1.63.131129
</dd>
</dl>
